channel.title: This Is A Major Annoyance... SERVER STATUS
channel.description:
Well Since It's Still Under-Way I Don't Mind Much But It's A Fairly Annoying Problem... This "Person" Who I Banned Off My Server For Giving Me Pictures And Graphics HE DID NOT MAKE And Where Copyrighted, Then Stating They Were His... I Found These With The Copyrights... Now He is pissed off so he posted his annoying on the server status page... so not only can i not put my server up when i am done, but it will have a bad rep and it will look like im some sort of hacker who sends people virus's via server... He States he's 9 and a girl... and yet... He/She goes through all this trouble...
FIGURED IT OUT AT- [url=http://riseofthefallen.smfforfree4.com/index.php/topic,202.0.html]http://riseofthefallen.smfforfree4.com/index.php/topic,202.0.html[/url] Server Status Page- [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=rotf.no-ip.biz]http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=rotf.no-ip.biz[/url]
So Moderators... Please Delete This Crap :P
Thanks So Much, ~Scootkid

item.title: This Is A Major Annoyance... SERVER STATUS
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Just change your IP lol so he doesnt know what it is to make a status page for it
